text: yud'dhattil ninnu viṭṭuninna grāmīṇa aṟabikaḷēāṭ paṟayuka: "kaṭhinamāya ākramaṇa śēṣiyuḷḷa janatte nēriṭān niṅṅaḷkk āhvānaṁ labhikkuṁ. avar kīḻaṭaṅṅuṁ vare niṅṅaḷavarēāṭ peārutēṇṭivaruṁ. ā āhvānaṁ niṅṅaḷ anusariccāl allāhu niṅṅaḷkk atimahattāya pratiphalaṁ nalkuṁ. athavā nēratte niṅṅaḷ pintiriññapēāle pinmāṟunnapakṣaṁ niṅṅaḷe avan śikṣikkuṁ. nēāvēṟuṁ śikṣa
